name: Play Concert
overview: Play Concert was set up as an innovative real time service dedicated to streaming live music events to the user’s digital device.   The business is primarily an online video streaming service that serves to complement rather than act as an alternative to concert going, servicing the needs of those who are unable to attend the concert of their choice. The service is unique as it’s the first dedicated system to bring forth full live concert footage on demand, on a consistent and regular basis. It offers users the chance to view and listen to live concert footage at a significantly lower cost, via the creation of an Online Pay Per View/Download platform. Footage is streamed in real time and audio downloads available after the concert has been completed.
